title: Are we being charged for the TV Times being delivered with the Sunday print edition? If so, how do I cancel?
text:
Subscription prices were raised 50 cents a week to include TV Times.



To make changes to your subscription, you can call customer service at 910-232-2391 or go to https://ssl.subscribehome.com/cgi-bin/cmo_wilmington.sh/custservice/web/login.html?siteid=wsn online.



Thanks for reading the StarNews
